name: Physiotherapy
description: Physiotherapy helps to restore movement and function when someone is affected by injury, illness or disability.
It is a dynamic field of healthcare that plays a crucial role in enhancing the quality of life for people of all ages.

name: Naturopathy
description: Naturopathy focuses on natural remedies and holistic approaches to promote healing and well-being,
encompassing therapies like yoga, diet, herbal medicine, and stress management.

name: Psychology
description: Psychotherapy is a collaborative treatment based on the relationship between an individual and a psychologist.
